nx: nx - grid cells in east/west direction
ny: ny - grid cells in north/south direction
xmn: xmn - x location of lower left grid cell center (m)
ymn: ymn - y location of lower left grid cell center (m)
max_iter: max_iter - number of model time steps
isingle_stn_flag: isingle_stn_flag (set to 0 for multi-station met input)
igrads_metfile: igrads_metfile (set to 0 for multi-station met input)
undef: undef - undefined data flag in both inputs and outputs
ascii_topoveg: ascii_topoveg - 1 for esri/ascii topo/veg files; 0 for GRADS
ved_shd_25: ved_shd_25 - snow holding depth (m) for veg class 25
ved_shd_26: ved_shd_26 - snow holding depth (m) for veg class 26
ved_shd_27: ved_shd_27 - snow holding depth (m) for veg class 27
ved_shd_28: ved_shd_28 - snow holding depth (m) for veg class 28
ved_shd_29: ved_shd_29 - snow holding depth (m) for veg class 29
ved_shd_30: ved_shd_30 - snow holding depth (m) for veg class 30
const_veg_flag: const_veg_flag - 0 if using veg file; otherwise a veg class (e.g. 12)
iveg_ht_flag: iveg_ht_flag - 0 to not use veg height; -1 for grads, 1 for ascii
xlat: xlat - mean lat of your domain (for solar calculations)
lat_solar_flag: lat_solar_flag - 0 for small domain, 1 for ascii, -1 for grads
UTC_flag: UTC_flag - 0 for small domain, 1 for ascii, -1 for grads
irun_data_assim: irun_data_assim - 0 for straight run; 1 for assim run
ihrestart_inc: ihrestart_inc - 0 if no restarting; this is the restart increment
i_tair_flag: i_tair_flag - 1 if you wish micromet to distribute temp
i_rh_flag: i_rh_flag - 1 if you wish micromet to distribute rel hum
i_wind_flag: i_wind_flag - 1 if you wish micromet to distribute wind
i_solar_flag: i_solar_flag - 1 if you wish micromet to distribute SWR
i_longwave_flag: i_longwave_flag - 1 if you wish micromet to distribute LWR
i_prec_flag: i_prec_flag - 1 if you wish micromet to distribute precip
ifill: ifill - 1 to calculate values for all grid cells
iobsint: iobsint - 0 to let model decide; 1 for user specified
dn: dn - units of deltax/y; radius of influence for interpolation
barnes_lg_domain: barnes_lg_domain - 0 to use all stations; 1 for local only
n_stns_used: n_stns_used - number of neighbors for interpolation
snowmodel_line_flag: snowmodel_line_flag - 0 to run whole domain, 1 for limited cells
check_met_data: check_met_data - 1 will check for valid data; not wise for long, large runs
curve_len_scale: curve_len_scale (m); set to ~1/2 the wavelength of topo features in domain
slopewt: slopewt - sum of this and curvewt should be 1; weighting factors
windspd_min: windspd_min - min wind speed (avoid blowing up when wind-->0.
lapse_rate_user_flag: lapse_rate_user_flag - 0 for default; 1 for user specified.
snowfall_frac: snowfall_frac - 1 for Auer, 2 for Dai, 3 for Liston
wind_lapse_rate: wind_lapse_rate - multiplier for increasing wind speeds
calc_subcanopy_met: calc_subcanopy_met - 1 for sub canopy values; 0 for above canopy
cloud_frac_factor: cloud_frac_factor - 1 for normal, lower to decrease cloud fraction
use_shortwave_obs: use_shortwave_obs - 0 for model computed radiation, 1 for data
use_longwave_obs: use_longwave_obs - 0 for model computed radiation, 1 for data
use_sfc_pressure_obs: use_sfc_pressure_obs - 1 to use data file for pressure
cf_precip_flag: cf_precip_flag - 0 for none, 1 for 2d grads, 2 for 2d text, 3 for scalar
Utau_t_flag: Utau_t_flag - constant (0) or variable (1) surface shear velocity
Utau_t_const: Utau_t_const - threshold surface shear velocity if Utau_t_flag = 0
subgrid_flag: subgrid_flag - 0 for res > 30 m, 1 for res < 30 m
tabler_dir: tabler_dir - dominant wind dir if subgrid_flag = 1
slope_adjust: slope_adjust - adjusts slope of Tabler surfaces
twolayer_flag: twolayer_flag - 1 for two-layer accounting of soft and hard layers
bc_flag: bc_flag - 0 for zero flux at upwind boundaries, 1 for eq. flux
topoflag: topoflag - 1 to use surface topo equal to snow topo; 0 for ground topo
icond_flag: icond_flag - 0 for no conduction; 1 for conduction
albedo_snow_forest: albedo_snow_forest - albedo under forest canopy for melting snowcover
albedo_snow_clearing: albedo_snow_clearing - albedo for melting snow in non-forested areas
multilayer_snowpack: multilayer_snowpack - 1 for yes; 0 for no. Must be off off for assim runs
tsls_threshold: tsls_threshold - time since last snowfall threshold
max_layers: max_layers - max layers allowed in a multi-layer run
dz_snow_min: dz_snow_min  - min snow layer thickness for a multi layer run
izero_snow_date: izero_snow_date - date to zero out snowpack in multi year run
seaice_run: seaice_run - 0 for land only run. See doc for other options
print_micromet: print_micromet - 1 to write it out; 0 to not
print_snowtran: print_snowtran - 1 to write it out; 0 to not
print_user: print_user - 1 to print stuff out; 0 to not
print_inc: print_inc - increment of time steps for output (3 hr time step x 8 = daily)
print_var_01: print_var_01 - air temp (degC) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_02: print_var_02 - relative humidity (%) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_03: print_var_03 - wind speed (m/s) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_04: print_var_04 - incoming solar rad (W/m2) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_05: print_var_05 - incoming longwave rad (W/m2) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_06: print_var_06 - outgoing longwave (W/m2) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_07: print_var_07 - albedo (0-1) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_08: print_var_08 - wind dir (0-360) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_09: print_var_09 - w.eq. precip (m / time step) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_10: print_var_10 - liquid precip (m / time step) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_11: print_var_11 - solid precip (m / time step) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_12: print_var_12 - SWE melt (m) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_13: print_var_13 - static surface subl (m) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_14: print_var_14 - runoff from base of snowpack (m / time step) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_15: print_var_15 - swe melt from glacier ice (m) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_16: print_var_16 - snow depth (m) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_17: print_var_17 - snow density (kg/m3) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_18: print_var_18 - swe (m) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_19: print_var_19 - summed snow precip during year (m) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_20: print_var_20 - summed swe melt during year (m) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_21: print_var_21 - cloud fraction (0-1) (y to print; n to not)
print_var_22: print_var_22 - user defined (y to print; n to not)
print_var_23: print_var_23 - user defined (y to print; n to not)
print_var_24: print_var_24 - user defined (y to print; n to not)
print_var_25: print_var_25 - user defined (y to print; n to not)
print_var_26: print_var_26 - user defined (y to print; n to not)
print_var_27: print_var_27 - user defined (y to print; n to not)
print_var_28: print_var_28 - user defined (y to print; n to not)
print_var_29: print_var_29 - user defined (y to print; n to not)
print_var_30: print_var_30 - user defined (y to print; n to not)
T_threshold: T_threshold - rain / snow threshold, a la Auer. (recommend 2.0)
T_Left,: T_Left, T_Right - bounding values for linear ramp for rain/snow
